name: Asteroids (itch) (Jonathan357611)
description:
This is my very first unity game where I just wanted to get familiar with the C# language. Its a super simple and small asteroids clone, just shoot the asteroids!

You control the ship with your movement keys (WASD), shoot with space or lmb. The ship looks in the direction of your cursor.

Thanks for playing and share your highscore :)
